title.narrative: BD Rural Water Supply and Sanitation Project

description.narrative: The PDO is to increase the provision of safe water supply and hygienic sanitation in selected rural areas of Bangladesh.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Section I A of Schedule 2 | Description :The recipient shall establish, and thereafter maintain, throughout theperiod of project implementation, the Project Management Unit, responsible for project management, implementation and supervision |Due Date :30-Jun-2012

Finance Agreement :Section II B.4 of Schedule 2 | Description :The recipient shall engage a Financial Management Consultant withqualifications, and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association, for the Project. | Due Date :12-Jun-2012
Finance Agreement :Section II B.4 of Schedule 2 | Description :The recipient shall establish and adopt a computerized accountingsystem, acceptable to the World Bank. | Due Date :12-Sep-2012

Finance Agreement :Section III E (a) of Schedule 2 | Description :The recipient shall engage a Procurement Consultant, withqualification and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association, forthe Project. | Due Date :12-Jul-2012
